info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 24 at 6:43PM MDT until July 24 at 7:30PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR CENTRAL MORGAN COUNTY... At 643 PM MDT, Flooding of county roads north of Brush has been reported. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen in a short amount of time. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Public reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, gulches, roads, and poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Fort Morgan, Brush, Log Lane Village, Hillrose, Snyder, Fort Morgan Airport and Union. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
